The latest working solution is to download NO STEAM repack iso from this link http://www.downloads.ws/games/169153-serious-sam-hd-the-second-encounter-nosteam-2010rusrepack-by-ultra.html 
It is russian version (text and voice) but when you install the game from that iso you can replace CONTENT folder with your english version CONTENT folder from any other version of the game you previously installed (and not worked). Don't touch any other folder. I don't have STEAM in my machine and i have installed this russian version easily and replaced CONTENT folder. No crack, no serial... just do as i said and you are good to go.
